ygData.subject: Apocalypse
ygData.msgSnippet: What fools they are outnumbered. He nodded to famine and he threw a grnade into the bush. He warned everyone to get down and be prepared for a big boom.

 "What fools they are outnumbered." He nodded to famine and he threw a grnade 
into the bush. He warned everyone to get down and be prepared for a big boom.
